title: Release notes
description: Release notes for a specific release of a product (or software collection)

product.description: Full and formal name for the product that was released

version.description: version of the product that was released. Semver preferred.

date.description: date of the release. Parsed - try to make this a valid date.

updated.description: date these release notes were last updated. Parsed - try to make this a valid date.

meta.description: collection of component versions that correspond to this release. Can be referenced by $name in meta.yml

intro.description: Multi-line string that provides a brief introduction to the release notes. Supports Markdown.

highlights.description: Short description of the highlights of the release. Supports Markdown. Can use lists for effect.

relnote.description: Short text for the release note entry

component.description: Component name - required if components is specified in meta.yml

component_version.description: Component version - required if components is specified in meta.yml

details.description: Optional multi-line string that provides more details about the release note. Supports Markdown.

jira.description: Jira number for tracking - not required but recommended

addresses.description: String with the issue numbers that this release note addresses. May move to markdown if requested - required as a field, not required to have content.

impact.description: determines sort order within section - required.
